OmniScript.description: It captrtes Notification Preferences at account label

omniProcessElements.description: This DR extracts vlocity Attribute Category Codes for Account
omniProcessElements.name: DRExtractAttrCategory
omniProcessElements.propertySetConfig: { "HTMLTemplateId" : "", "bundle" : "VPLGetAccountAttributeCategory", "controlWidth" : 12, "dataRaptor Input Parameters" : [ ], "disOnTplt" : false, "enableActionMessage" : false, "enableDefaultAbort" : false, "errorMessage" : { "custom" : [ ] }, "failureAbortLabel" : null, "failureAbortMessage" : null, "failureGoBackLabel" : null, "failureNextLabel" : null, "inProgressMessage" : null, "label" : null, "message" : { }, "postMessage" : null, "pubsub" : false, "redirectNextLabel" : null, "redirectNextWidth" : 3, "redirectPageName" : "", "redirectPreviousLabel" : null, "redirectPreviousWidth" : 3, "redirectTemplateUrl" : "vlcAcknowledge.html", "remoteTimeout" : 30000, "responseJSONNode" : "", "responseJSONPath" : "", "show" : { "group" : { "operator" : "OR", "rules" : [ { "condition" : "=", "data" : "0", "field" : "TotalAttrAssignCount" }, { "condition" : "=", "data" : null, "field" : "TotalAttrAssignCount" } ] } }, "showPersistentComponent" : [ false, false ], "ssm" : false, "validationRequired" : "Step", "wpm" : false }

omniProcessElements.name: SVAccNotification
omniProcessElements.propertySetConfig: { "HTMLTemplateId" : "", "controlWidth" : 12, "disOnTplt" : false, "elementValueMap" : { "BillNotifications" : "=%AccountPref:BillNotifications:AttrValue%", "DNCFrom" : "=IF(%AccountPref:DNCFrom:AttrValue% = \"\" || %AccountPref%=\"\", \"None\",%AccountPref:DNCFrom:AttrValue% )", "DNCTo" : "=IF(%AccountPref:DNCTo:AttrValue% = \"\" || %AccountPref%=\"\", \"None\",%AccountPref:DNCTo:AttrValue% )", "OffersPromotions" : "=%AccountPref:OffersPromotions:AttrValue%", "OutageNotifications" : "=%AccountPref:OutageNotifications:AttrValue%", "PaymentRemindersNotifications" : "=%AccountPref:PaymentReminders:AttrValue%", "TotalAttrAssignCount" : "=%AccountNotificationPreference:TotalNotification%", "WorkOrderNotifications" : "=%AccountPref:WorkorderNotifications:AttrValue%" }, "label" : null, "message" : { }, "pubsub" : false, "show" : null, "showPersistentComponent" : [ false, false ], "ssm" : false, "wpm" : false }
